question.title: What is the typical growth rate of a child with precocious puberty?
question.description: A child with precocious puberty typically experiences a growth rate that is

option_a.title: Slower than average
option_a.description: A child with precocious puberty typically experiences a growth rate that is slower than average

option_b.title: Faster than average
option_b.description: A child with precocious puberty typically experiences a growth rate that is faster than average

option_c.title: Same as average
option_c.description: A child with precocious puberty typically experiences a growth rate that is the same as average

option_d.title: Variable
option_d.description: A child with precocious puberty typically experiences a growth rate that is variable and can vary depending on the individual

correct_option.title: B
correct_option.description: The correct answer is indicated by a letter
